query:
INSERT INTO durable.task(name, wasm, data, running_on)
                    SELECT
                        $1 as name,
                        $2 as wasm,
                        $3 as data,
                        (SELECT id
                           FROM durable.worker
                          ORDER BY random()
                          LIMIT 1
                          FOR SHARE SKIP LOCKED
                        ) as running_on
                    RETURNING id
